definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: blow (NH = BH; Chr.-Pal.-Aram. n4p Schwally:Idiot.58; Ar nasafa (vulg.) id. (Dozy:ii. 667; on usu. mng. cf. Wetzst:ZPV xiv. 7); ‖ form of [[נשׁב]], cf. Jen:ZA iv (1889), 268);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[בָּהֶם]] ´[[נ]] Is 40:24 he hath blow upon them (of ´[[י]] under fig. of wind); 2 ms. [[נׇשַׁפְתָּ בְרוּחְֲ]] Ex 15:10 (song).
